original_title: Against All Odds: Team NetApp's Giro d'Italia
overview: With a Wildcard entry into the Giro d'Italia 3-week Pro Cycling Race, the 2nd league Team NetApp now gets an opportunity to compete at its first Grand Tour. Watch the underdogs on their way to the toughest race in the world.
title: Against All Odds: Team NetApp's Giro d'Italia
